# Change Log
All notable changes to the "borland" extension will be documented in this file.

## [0.1.0] - 2019-11-9
- Changed Activity bar background to blue
- Changed drop down background to blue
- Changed search bar background to blue
## [0.0.2] - 2019-03-11
- Add Changelog
- Add repository link

## [0.0.1] - 2019-03-11
- Initial release
